de.lessvoid.nifty

Class Nifty

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.Nifty

  • public class Nifty
extends Object
    The main control class of all things Nifty.
    Author:
    void

        Check all @Handler annotations at the given listener Object and subscribe all of them.
        Parameters:

      • update

        public void update()
        The Nifty update method. This should be called each frame.

      • render

        public boolean render()
        Render the Nifty scene.
        Returns:
        true if the frame changed and false if the content is still the same

      • startAnimatedThreaded

        public void startAnimatedThreaded(long delay,
                                  long interval,
                                  NiftyCallback<Float> callback)
        Calls back the given NiftyCallback after delay ms every interval ms. This will call NiftyCallback on another thread so be careful what you do there. Nifty 2.0 is not yet thread safe!
        Parameters:
        delay - time to wait in ms
        interval - interval to call the callback in ms
        callback - the actual callback

      • startAnimated

        public void startAnimated(long delay,
                          long interval,
                          NiftyCallback<Float> callback)
        Calls back the given NiftyCallback after delay ms every interval ms.
        This will be called on Niftys update loop so the callback shouldn't do a lot of processing to not delay Niftys processing.
        Parameters:
        delay - time to wait in ms
        interval - interval to call the callback in ms
        callback - the actual callback

      • startAnimated

        public <N extends NiftyNode> void startAnimated(long delay,
                                                long interval,
                                                N node,
                                                NiftyNodeCallback<Float,N> callback)
        Calls back the given NiftyNodeCallback after delay ms every interval ms. This method take a NiftyNodeCallback which will be called with the NiftyNode you provide in this call as a service.
        This will be called on Niftys update loop so the callback shouldn't do a lot of processing to not delay Niftys processing.
        Parameters:
        delay - time to wait in ms
        interval - interval to call the callback in ms
        node - the node to call the NiftyCallback with
        callback - the actual callback

        public NiftyImage createNiftyImage(String filename)
        Create a new NiftyImage.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename to load
        Returns:
        a new NiftyImage

        Get the width of the current screen mode.
        Returns:

      • getScreenHeight

        public int getScreenHeight()
        Get the height of the current screen mode.
        Returns:
        height of the current screen

      • getSceneInfoLog

        public String getSceneInfoLog()
        Output the state of all root nodes (and the whole tree below) to a String. This is meant to aid in debugging. DON'T RELY ON ANY INFORMATION IN HERE SINCE THIS CAN BE CHANGED IN FUTURE RELEASES!
        Returns:
        String that contains the debugging info for all root nodes

      • getSceneInfoLog

        public String getSceneInfoLog(String filter)
        Output the state of all Nifty to a String. This is meant to aid in debugging. DON'T RELY ON ANY INFORMATION IN HERE SINCE THIS CAN BE CHANGED IN FUTURE RELEASES!
        Parameters:
        filter - regexp to filter the output (Example: "position" will only output position info)
        Returns:
        String that contains the debugging info for all root nodes

      • getStatistics

        public NiftyStatistics getStatistics()
        Get the NiftyStatistics instance where you can request a lot of statistics about Nifty.
        Returns:
        the NiftyStatistics instance

      • getTimeProvider

        public TimeProvider getTimeProvider()
        Get the TimeProvider of this Nifty instance.
        Returns:
        the TimeProvider

                                                            Class<X> clazz)
